TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskCompletionSource`1<TResult> extends System.Object
generic <typename TResult> public ref class TaskCompletionSource

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 与此 关联的结果值的类型。

span.span: The type of the result value associated with this .

summary.span: 表示未绑定到委托的 的制造者方，并通过 属性提供对使用者方的访问。

span.span: Represents the producer side of a unbound to a delegate, providing access to the consumer side through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多情况下，启用 表示外部异步操作非常有用。In many scenarios, it is useful to enable a to represent an external asynchronous operation. 为此，提供 。 is provided for this purpose. 它允许创建可以向使用者传递的任务。It enables the creation of a task that can be handed out to consumers. 使用者可以使用任务的成员，其方式与处理任务成员变量的任何其他方案相同。The consumers can use the members of the task the same way as they would in any other scenario handling task member variables. 但是，与大多数任务不同，TaskCompletionSource 创建的任务的状态由 TaskCompletionSource 上的方法显式控制。However, unlike most tasks, the state of a task created by a TaskCompletionSource is controlled explicitly by the methods on TaskCompletionSource. 这样就可以完成外部异步操作以传播到基础任务。This enables the completion of the external asynchronous operation to be propagated to the underlying Task. 分隔还可确保使用者不能在不访问相应 TaskCompletionSource 的情况下转换状态。The separation also ensures that consumers are not able to transition the state without access to the corresponding TaskCompletionSource. 有关详细信息，请参阅与 .NET 并行编程中的[TaskCompletionSource\](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/the-nature-of-taskcompletionsourcetresult/)博客。For more information, see the entry [The Nature of TaskCompletionSource\](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/the-nature-of-taskcompletionsourcetresult/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. [并行扩展示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717)还包含了有关如何使用 的示例。The [Parallel Extensions samples](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) also contain examples of how to use . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 ：The following example shows how to use a : [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/cs/taskcompletionsource.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/vb/taskcompletionsource.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有成员都是线程安全的，可同时从多个线程使用。

span.span: All members of are thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.

Returns the created by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性，使用者可以访问由此实例控制的 。This property enables a consumer to access the that is controlled by this instance. 创建 对象时，此 对象的 属性将返回 When you create a object, the property of this object returns 此实例上的 、、和 方法（及其 "重试" 变体）都将导致此基础任务上的相关状态转换。The , , , and methods (and their "Try" variants) on this instance all result in the relevant state transitions on this underlying Task.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TrySetCanceled() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试将基础 转换为 状态。

span.span: Attempts to transition the underlying into the state.

returns.span: 如果操作成功，则为 ；如果操作失败或对象已被释放，则为 false。

span.span: if the operation was successful; false if the operation was unsuccessful or the object has already been disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 已经处于以下三个最终状态之一： 、或 ，则此操作将返回 false。This operation will return false if the is already in one of the three final states: , , or . 如果基础 已被释放，此方法也会返回 false。This method also returns false if the underlying has already been disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果基础 对象已处于以下三个最终状态之一，则该方法将返回 false。The method returns false if the underlying object is already in one of the following three final states. - - - 如果基础 对象已被释放，此方法也会返回 `false`。This method also returns `false` if the underlying object has already been disposed.
